121.content:
"I choose Taylor Swift as my opponent as our match will take place at the AT&T Center in San Antonio Texas." You said.

"Very well then, now then choose a fetish." The booming voice said.

"The fetish I've chosen is a giant fat animated anthropomorphic baby animal fetish." You said.

"Now that you have picked your fetish, it's time for you to transform." The booming voice said.

Immediately you transformed into a giant fat animated anthropomorphic baby animal in other words K-9 from Looney Tunes as you happened to be looming over the AT&T center itself.

"So this is what's it like to be a giant fat animated anthropomorphic baby animal, now to take off my helmet belt and giant sized Pampers cruisers diaper before I wrestle my opponent." You said.

You take off your helmet as you then take off your belt and your giant sized Pampers cruisers diaper as you threw it as far away as possible.

"Ah I feel better already, now I'm ready to wrestle my opponent." You said as you lifted the building's roof and made your presence known as you giant stepped your way towards the wrestling ring as you made your way into the wrestling ring itself.

"Peekaboo all you expendable little extras, this giant fat animated anthropomorphic baby animal's gonna enjoy beating my opponent!" You roared.
121.title: Taylor Swift

info.brief_description: A chance to wrestle with the ladies of your dreams or nightmares. Have fun.
info.description:
You go to a fortune teller gypsy with your buddy to have his fortune read. You don't believe in this stuff but you go with him anyways. When the gypsy starts talking you mutter "bullshit" under your breath. She looks at you and says "oh its bullshit huh" she chants and casts a spell on you." When you go to sleep tonight you will wake up into a portal to your demise unless you can somehow survive. It will have your biggest dreams trying to harm and possibly kill you. If you make it through then I will submit to you and be your slave. If you lose then you will come back to me and be my slave and who knows what torments i will put you through" she says. You again say "oh this is just a huge crock of bull" and get up and walk out. You go home for the night and stay up watching tv. Slowly you drift to sleep and suddenly you are in a white room kind of like the matrix and you hear a loud voice say.." Who will be the instrument of your destruction?" And holograms of the choices pop up almost as if you are stuck in a video game.





Feel free to add as you wish.
Fetishes are not limited to wrestling and they dont have to fight fair.
Have fun and post as much as you can, i want to make this a very long story with many many choices.
